title: A stunning new forecast shows when thousands of glaciers will vanish
description: New research reveals when glaciers around the world will vanish and why every fraction of a degree of warming could decide their fate.
content: New research reveals when glaciers around the world will vanish and why every fraction of a degree of warming could decide their fate.
